text:
JuryMatic | Project Maintainer | REMOTE or SF | Hourly

Bay Area legal tech company seeking a full stack Python developer to maintain an application and implement some new features on an as-needed basis.

Must have experience: Django, distributed task queues (preferably Celery), PostgreSQL, decent front-end skills.

Bonus points: Heroku, Azure, Writing small Windows services, stats knowledge.

Email info@jurymatic.com
